refnamediv.refpurpose: A document manager application for GNOME

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gnome-documents is a document manager application designed to work with GNOME 3. You can view your local and online documents, search through them, print or mark them as favorites. It's included in the default set of core applications since GNOME 3.2.

refsect1.title: Bugs
refsect1.para: The bug tracker can be reached by visiting the website https://bugzilla.gnome.org/buglist.cgi?product=gnome-documents. Before sending a bug report, please verify that you have the latest version of gnome-documents. Many bugs (major and minor) are fixed at each release, and if yours is out of date, the problem may already have been solved.

refsect1.title: Additional Information
refsect1.para: For further information, visit the website http://live.gnome.org/GnomeDocuments.
